processed_by.processor: Cui, Hong using Text2XML java application init commit r86, validated against beeSchema.xsd revision f0a80a8516a06e51224d01314403eb26d60f881d

taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section setosi;species wheeleri;

treatment.description: With canes remotely armed as in no. 127; corymb as heavily spiculose as in no. 123; primocane-leaves sublustrous above; the terminal leaflet rounded-obovate, abruptly short-tipped, three-fourths to four-fifths as broad as long; corymb as broad as long, the lower foliaceous bracts narrowly oblong and entire to lance-acuminate and lacerate; petals 7 or 8 mm. broad.
treatment.habitat_elevation_distribution_or_ecolog: Swamps and damp thickets, s. Mich.
